connectorUiConfig.title: Microsoft Intune-Endpoint Management
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: Connect to Microsoft Intune logs for endpoint management via Diagnostic Logs. Microsoft Intune allows you to efficiently manage a wide array of endpoints, including Windows 10/11, Android, iOS, macOS, Chrome, and Linux Ubuntu, ensuring comprehensive device management. For enhanced security, it is advisable to monitor alterations, onboarding activities, and device compliance.
connectorUiConfig.lastDataReceivedInfoBalloon: If no new data has been received in the last 14 days, the connector will display as being "not connected." When the connector will receive data, the "connected" status will return.

instructionSteps.title: Connect Microsoft Intune to Microsoft Sentinel
instructionSteps.description: Enable Diagnostic Logs on Microsoft Intune

instructionSteps.title: Open Microsoft Intune Portal:
instructionSteps.description:
Navigate to Reports:
    
1.  Select **+ Add diagnostic setting**
2.  In the **Diagnostic setting** blade:
  -   Type a **Name**, within the **Diagnostics settings** name field.
  -   Select **Send to Log Analytics**.
  -   Choose the log destination workspace.
  -   Select the categories that you want to analyze (recommended: AuditLogs, OperationalLogs, DeviceComplianceOrg, Devices)
  -   Click **Save**.
